name: Dark Maze Escape
description:
This is a basic example of how to make a horror/escape game with elements that change on the fly.  To complicate matters, the player has a limited viewpoint due to the darkness of the area they are trapped in.

Desktop controls : Arrow keys or WASD to move the player character. Hold space to 'close your eyes'

Mobile controls : Touch to move the player character in that direction. Touch and hold near the player character to 'close your eyes'

Features include :

- Desktop controls
- Mobile controls
- A maze that changes as you move through it
- Traps and enemies that add danger and force you to keep moving
- Sound effects
- Basic text prompts that show you your current and best level
- Increasing difficulty level as you progress

If you like this prototype or are a Construct developer, please consider donating, or purchasing this template to get access to the template files.

Any bugs or feedback, please leave a comment or drop me a message, thanks!
